text: Gaadi aayi Gaadi aayi chuk chuk chuk...
Sitti dekho kaise baji cuk cuk cuk...
Gaadi mein baitho sab chad chad ,
Saaman bhi upar rakho fath fath fath
Ticket ke paise nikalo chan chan chan ...
Khidki se dekho mat shh shh shhh ...
Plane aaya, plane aaya jhup jhup
Baadalo ke beech se ha fuk fuk fuk
Plane mein baitho sab fath fath fath...
Seat belt bandho sabhi  fath fath fath...
So jao sab aankhe bandh kar zzzzzzzz....
Plane udta jayega jhup jhup jhup ...
